description: Strengthening Capacity for National Human Development Report (NHDR) Reporting

subproject.corporate outcome: Capacities of national and local institutions enhanced to scale up proven MDG acceleration interventions and to plan, monitor, report and evaluate the MDG progress in the context of related national development priorities
subproject.description: The project promotes and develops the understanding of the concept of human development and its challenges for development in the Lao PDR through the process of preparation of the National Human Development Reports (NHDR).
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: Human Development Report

title: Strengthen Capacity for National Human Development Repor
